name: プロデューサー
text:
そうじゃないか、
ごみのステッカー貼ってあるし
trans:
I thought so.
Since it has a “trash this” label on it and all.

name: プロデューサー
text:
ずっと埋もれてたやつだよ、このギター
棚の奥にさ
trans:
It's been here for quite a while.
Hidden behind the shelves.

name: プロデューサー
trans:
This...
It's a cicada, isn't it.

name: プロデューサー
text:
うん。まだ殻から出てきたばっかりなんじゃないか
羽根も伸びてないし
trans:
Yeah. Looks like it's just emerged out of its shell.
It isn't spreading out its wings at all too.

name: プロデューサー
text:
もうちゃんと音出ないんじゃないかな
弦とかも錆びてるし、首も反ってるし
trans:
I don't think it can be played anymore.
The strings are rusty and its neck is warped too.

name: 透
text:
んー
古い。めっちゃ

name: 透
trans: I wonder if it'll make a sound────

name: プロデューサー
text:
いや……
わからないけど、まだ弱そうだからさ
trans:
No... I don't know. 
Just that it's still weak and all.

name: 透
text:
うん
つきそう。指紋
trans:
Yeah.
Seems like they'll stick. My fingerprints.

name: 透
text:
柔らかそう、めっちゃ
羽根とか……お腹とか
trans:
It looks really soft.
It's wings...and abdomen.

name: プロデューサー
text:
はは
まぁ、鳴ることは鳴るだろうけど
trans:
Haha.
Well, I'm sure it can make a sound but,

name: プロデューサー
text:
──たぶん、まだしっかりした体じゃないよ
飛べるようになるまではこのままだ
trans:
──It's probably not fully developed yet.
It'll stay like this until it can spread its wings 
and take flight.

name: プロデューサー
text:
鳥とかにも狙われるんだろうし、
安全なとこに置いてあげたい気はするけど……
trans:
It'll make easy prey for birds and stuff.
I feel like we should leave it somewhere safe...

name: 透
text: 生きられないかもなんだ
trans: So there's a chance it might not live.

name: プロデューサー
text:
まぁ……
ごみって言い方するのは、気が引けるよ
trans:
Well...
Calling it “trash” might have been a little harsh.

name: プロデューサー
text: これ、捨てるのやめてさ

name: 透
text:
ふふ
セミかな、鳴かなくても
trans:
Fufu.
I wonder if it's still a cicada, 
even if it doesn't make a sound.

name: 透
text:
こいつだけじゃん
黙ってるの
trans:
It's the only one here.
That's silent.

name: 透
text:
鳴り終わったんでしょ、きっと
もう
trans: I'm sure it's just, gotten tired of making noise. It's done now.

name: プロデューサー
text:
……
黙っててもセミはセミだけど……
trans:
...
Pretty sure even a silent cicada is still a cicada...

name: プロデューサー
text: 鳴くやつになろうとしてる
trans: It's trying to be like the others.

name: 透
text:
きれいなのにね
めっちゃ、今
trans: Even though it looks so pretty now.

name: 透
text:
鳴けなくて、
飛べないけど
trans:
Even if it can't make a sound,
or spread its wings.

name: 透
text:
んー
でも、きれい。鳴らないやつ
trans:
Yeah.
Even if it doesn't make sound now, it's still beautiful.

name: 透
text:
鳴ってた時が、
あるって思うと
trans:
Because you can think about how there was 
a time when it could.

name: 透
text:
ギター、って呼ぼ
こいつのこと

また会えるかは
わからないけど
trans:
We don't know 
if we'll ever see it again

text:
音楽になるのか
鳴き声
trans:
Will its cries 
turn into music?

name: プロデューサー
text:
きっと、いっぱい鳴ってくれるよ
無事に生きてさ
trans:
I'm sure it'll make a whole lot of noise.
And live a normal life.

name: 透
text:
似てるから、
あの鳴らないやつと
trans: It's too much like that old, silent thing.

name: 透
text:
続いてたらいいなって。ここに
あのギターの時間
trans:
I'd like it if the life of that guitar could continue, 
right here. 
Through this cicada.

name: 透
text:
覚えとくために
こいつのこと
trans: I want to name it, so I'll always remember it.

name: 透
text:
鳴いても、
このまま鳴かないで終わっても
trans:
Whether it starts to make sound one day,
or stays quiet the whole way.

name: 透
text: いつか鳴けなくなっても
trans: Or if it sings till it becomes unable to.

name: 透
text: きれいな音出してたってこと
trans:
I'll make sure to always remember that 
it once made a beautiful sound.

name: 透
text:
ふふっ
何、かっこいい
trans:
Fufu.
What's with that? Sounds cool.

name: 透
text:
なるんじゃない？
音楽になりたいって思えば、こいつが
trans:
Maybe it will, though?
If it wanted to make music, I bet it could.

name: 透
trans: I'm sure it's the same for that guitar.

name: 透
text:
次、なりたいって思ったらなれる
セミに
trans:
If it wished hard enough for it, 
it could become one in it's next life.
A cicada.
